description: A post-apocalyptic landscape features two towering mushroom clouds in the background, signifying a nuclear event. The foreground shows a scene of destruction with a flipped blue car, a broken telephone pole, a damaged shack on a hill, and craters in the ground. Amidst the debris, a vintage television set sits upright, displaying a test pattern on its screen. A damaged bicycle is also visible nearby.
caption: “This is a test. For the next thirty seconds, this station will conduct a test of the emergency broadcast system ...”
